function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Community transmission of SARS-CoV-2","Impact":"High infection rates and potential overwhelming of healthcare system","Mitigation":"Implementation of non-pharmaceutical interventions (NPIs) and travel restrictions","Technologies":"Contact tracing apps, temperature screening technology","People":"Public, healthcare workers, travelers","Owner":"National and regional governments, healthcare institutions"},{"Description":"Imported COVID-19 cases","Impact":"Potential spread of the virus to local population","Mitigation":"Strict quarantine measures for incoming travelers, travel advisories","Technologies":"Testing kits, quarantine monitoring apps","People":"Local population, travelers","Owner":"National and regional governments, airport authorities"},{"Description":"Suspension of religious pilgrimage and closure of public venues","Impact":"Disruption of traditional and cultural practices","Mitigation":"Implementation of strict NPIs, communication of health guidelines","Technologies":"Virtual event platforms, online cultural resources","People":"Community members, travelers, religious practitioners","Owner":"National and regional governments, religious institutions"}]}
